QuestData.Title: Third Try's the Charm
QuestData.Description:
What? Another one's seized power? Whatever happened to abhorring a vacuum? Or at least waiting for a respectful period of mourning to pass in order to keep up appearances?
Do they have no decency? No sense of propriety? No respect for a well-crafted plan? I made charts!
Deal with this Bloodclaw fellow. I need a moment.
And I don't need your nagging comments, thank you very much!
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Who died and appointed him warleader?
QuestData.RewardText: Finally! That has to be the last one. Right?
